thread.title: Grammys Moments You May Have Missed | InStyle.com
thread.title_full: Grammys Moments You May Have Missed | InStyle.com

author: Isabel Jones
title: Grammys Moments You May Have Missed | InStyle.com
text:
by: Isabel Jones 
The 2017 Grammy Awards ceremony was, as expected, totally off the wall. From Beyoncé’s gravity-defying performance to Adele’s graceful do-over tribute , we’re overwhelmed by OMG moments. But honestly, some of the most incredible moments of the evening didn't happen on stage or the red carpet. These blink-or-you'll-miss-it snapshots were among the very best of the night. Enjoy! 
VIDEO: A Taste of the Grammys: What's on the Menu for Music's Biggest Night Queen Bey got meta AF. Her dress actually bore an embroidered portrait of her face.
